issue.title: [JS] wrong signed to unsigned conversion in js
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1370](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1370). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In JavaScript reader, signed integer vectors are initialized with unsigned int vectors. This is in file types.ts, lines 158, 159, 160 and 167, 168, 169.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1370?focusedCommentId=16322424) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
This issue is referencing the old implementation, and has been resolved in the new one
